name: Tumblr - Tilt the Dashboard!
description:
Put a little perspective into your dashboard!
Works with most other stylish themes.
*NOTE*: some pages of the dashboard will not be affected by this style.
Some links *might* be rendered unclickable. This is just the nature of the 'matrix' attribute.

Check out my other styles!
Check out my tumblr: http://pacifiqa.tumblr.com

user.name: mlg
user.about:
I'm an artist not a coder and I code off the top of my head, so my 'styles' may be a little messy.
[I will try to update my styles when I can, however, I'm an undergrad student with not a lot of spare time]

additional_info:
To install a different sized slant, just uninstall style and re-install with new option.

One sacrifice with this style:
Return to top button goes missing.
